snippet.title: Project Downfall 5th Early Access update Release Trailer
snippet.description:
EARLY ACCESS FIFTH UPDATE: 17.VII.2019

Wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/992730/Project_Downfall/
http://project-downfall.com/

PLEASE NOTE! The update contains a lot of new dialogue and is only available in English. It will be translated to other languages as soon as possible. 

Project Downfall: A dynamic, stylish, trippy and brutal FPS with adventure elements.

Bust through the multiple levels inspired by the likes of HardcoreHenry, or John Wick. Self-medicate to give yourself an edge in combat, so pop those pills and grab your guns... and embrace your Downfall!

https://www.indiedb.com/games/project-downfall

https://twitter.com/mgpstudios

------
The update will be available Wednesday 17.July.2019 around noon CTE and will come together with a 30% discount. 

PLEASE NOTE: Due to the amount of new content and possibilities, to avoid conflicts with previous save-games, progress will be reset with the update. Unfortunately this is to be expected during dev and we will try to keep this down to a minimum from now on. 

A quick summary of the upcoming Early Access update:

-updated and tweaked aiming system

-more non-linearity and branching paths

-updated sanity system which will impact various elements during your chosen path.

-a heck of a lot of other smaller stuff

for more detailed info, please check out the announcement updates on STEAM(detailed notes for the newest update will go live shortly after the update is available on the 17th July):

https://steamcommunity.com/app/992730/allnews/

-----
Most important upcoming fixes:

-for the next update our highest priority is finalising and adding the new FPS controller which ought to make movement much smoother

-updates, refinement and tweaks to current content

-more non linear dependencies and possibilities

-adding save slots so it will be possible to experiment on a different branch without losing your current progress/contents/unlocked route

-a high score/replay mode where you will be able to play all unlocked levels from all save slots
